notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: M.A., E.N.N., C.Y.N. and N.Y.N., conceived and designed the experiments; M.A. performed the laboratory works and wrote the first draft of the manuscript; M.A., M.A.R., O.A.G. and A.A.A. analyzed the data, edited and corrected the manuscript. All authors gave final approval for publication.
